item.description:
• Added visual effects to the cards • Added a pile effect to the stock and waste stacks • Cards now drop onto their designated ace cell automatically • Added card back settings to the Deck & Game Settings context menu • The window now has a preferred size and a minimum size
• Improved the sizing of the play area • Improved dropping card fans

• Updated the design of the card cells • Updated the layout of the board • Added variable spacing of cards in a stack based on the available space • Added a slight jitter to card stacks • Added a Deck & Game Settings button in the titlebar (currently only allows changing the deck by right-clicking)
• Removed the confirmation dialog when starting a new game
• Fixed the incorrect positioning of cards in a stack after dropping them • Fixed an issue that caused the app to quit unexpectedly when a font was not installed on the userʼs device

• Added an app icon • Added the Mage and Fool card deck • Removed unused menus and menu items
• Fixed the absence of a dialog when winning the game
